mapper.select: SELECT A.P_CATE AS P_CATE, NVL(SUM(CNT),0) AS CNT FROM (SELECT P_CATE FROM TB_PRODUCT_CATE) A, (SELECT P_CATE, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_USER_PRODUCT GROUP BY P_CATE) B WHERE A.P_CATE = B.P_CATE(+) GROUP BY A.P_CATE

SELECT A.P_CATE P_CATE, NVL(SUM("01"),0) AS "1월", NVL(SUM("02"),0) AS "2월", NVL(SUM("03"),0) AS "3월", NVL(SUM("04"),0) AS "4월", NVL(SUM("05"),0) AS "5월", NVL(SUM("06"),0) AS "6월", NVL(SUM("07"),0) AS "7월", NVL(SUM("08"),0) AS "8월", NVL(SUM("09"),0) AS "9월", NVL(SUM("10"),0) AS "10월", NVL(SUM("11"),0) AS "11월", NVL(SUM("12"),0) AS "12월", NVL(SUM(TTL),0) AS "총합" FROM (SELECT P_CATE FROM TB_PRODUCT_CATE) A, ( SELECT P_CATE, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '01', 1)) "01", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '02', 1)) "02", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '03', 1)) "03", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '04', 1)) "04", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '05', 1)) "05", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '06', 1)) "06", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '07', 1)) "07", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '08', 1)) "08", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '09', 1)) "09", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '10', 1)) "10", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '11', 1)) "11", COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'MM'), '12', 1)) "12", COUNT(*) AS TTL FROM TB_USER_PRODUCT WHERE TO_CHAR(P_CREATED_AT, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') GROUP BY P_CATE ) B WHERE A.P_CATE = B.P_CATE(+) GROUP BY A.P_CATE
